sentences.cn: 安全气囊遇到撞击立即膨胀。

sentences.en: Almost instantaneously, thunder cracked deafeningly overhead.
sentences.cn: 几乎同时, 头上突然爆发出震耳欲聋的雷声.

sentences.en: Didn't your church back home instantaneously translate into 40 languages?
sentences.cn: 难道你家乡的教堂不能把演说辞同时翻译成40种语言?

sentences.en: He got the whole charge of shot in his chest. He must have died almost instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 一枪正打在他胸膛上, 他几乎是当场毙命的.

sentences.en: I should fancy it was prussic acid , as she seems to have died instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 我估计是氢氰酸, 因为她好象是立刻断气的.

sentences.en: In a crash, momentum changes abruptly but not instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 在撞击过程中, 动量的变化是突然的,但非瞬时的.

sentences.en: Instantaneously all the Buddhalands in the ten directions quaked in six ways.
sentences.cn: 即时十方普佛世界,六种震动.

sentences.en: It collapsed instantaneously once we left Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 我们一撤出越南,它马上就土崩瓦解了.

sentences.en: Once the cargo has been shipped, insurance can be covered instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 货物一旦发出, 我会立即投保.

sentences.en: Once the cargo is shipped, insurance can be covered instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 货物一旦发出, 我就会立即投保.

sentences.en: Our powder has to take fire instantaneously so that its mechanical effect may be complete.
sentences.cn: 只要火药能够很快地燃烧,使它的力量能得到充分的发挥就行了.

sentences.en: The combustion of the mixture does not take place instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 混合物的燃烧不是立即发生的.

sentences.en: The nitrogen atoms combine instantaneously , simultaneously and spontaneously.
sentences.cn: 氮原子瞬间同时自动化合.

sentences.en: The patient would become almost instantaneously unconscious.
sentences.cn: 这位患者几乎一下子便失去知觉.

sentences.en: What we used to be fond of will become the past instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 向之所欣,俯仰之间,已为陈迹,犹不能不以之兴怀.
